snippet.title: Divide By Sheep 2 OUT NOW! - Official Steam Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Put a thinkin’ cap on and get ready to save some sheep. Get the “baaaa-rain” juices flowin’ in a wacky cartoon world and save only the right amount of sheep, even if that means…dividing the poor little guys. Beware the terrifying Grim Reaper, who will stop at nothing to collect the adorable creatures when a math problem is too hard to crack. 

Get now on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2678960/Divide_By_Sheep_2
Or AppStore: https://apps.apple.com/gb/app/divide-by-sheep-2/id1625331434
